column5: http://www.cbc.ca/news/canada/prince-edward-island/koen-norton-tuna-record-1.3258838  Koen Norton, the 10-year-old P.E.I. boy who made headlines for landing a 486-pound bluefin tuna at the end of August, has outdone himself. Norton, from Naufrage, on the northeastern end of the Island, nearly doubled his record on Sunday by reeling in an 847.7-pound tuna on his dad Greg's charter boat.
Can we quit with atlantics and stock those please?
Haha yeah really! I think unless I go tuna fishing, he's caught more pounds of fish I ever will lol
